revision_note: Linked post-GA v1.0 initiatives to docs/post-ga/V1_0_INITIATIVES.md

initiatives.notes: Aligned README narrative, added SECURITY/CONTRIBUTING guidance, created docs/ci.md, and added CI health gate workflow with security dashboard alerts.
Extended jest roots to include prompts/ for prompt integrity tests.
Added node:test prompt integrity check in scripts/ci/__tests__/prompt-integrity.node.test.mjs.
Hybrid GraphRAG contract, Neptune managed adapter, deterministic bench artifacts, and security regression fixtures for competitive intel pack.
Scaffold adenhq/hive subsumption bundle, required check mapping, and evidence-first lane-1 posture.

epics.name: Connector SDK & Registry
epics.evidence: Only CSVConnector.ts found; SDK framework incomplete

initiatives.notes: Platform Watch pipeline: schemas, allowlist, drift detection, artifacts, workflow, and KG mapping.
Published GA gate failure catalog with deterministic remediation paths and evidence requirements in docs/ga/GATE_FAILURE_CATALOG.md.
Published governed break-glass policy with evidence, approval flow, and constraints in docs/ga/BREAK_GLASS.md.
Improved GA gate error copy and remediation guidance in scripts/ci/validate-pr-metadata.ts, scripts/ci/verify-prompt-integrity.ts, and scripts/ga-gate.sh.
SIM badge applied to simulated SYMPHONY tabs; mobile More screen implemented; MapFullScreen and AlertDetails routes registered with aligned types and GA verification.
Summit-native SERA CLI-style proxy integration with evidence artifacts and guardrails.
Governance evidence JSON artifacts, schemas, deterministic gate runner, and NDS foundation flags. Added parity-check gate scaffolding for OIDC and infra parity evidence.
PromptSpec schema, clean-room pack, eval rubric, and policy gate scaffolding.
